Justia Lawyer Directory

Get your colleagues to do the talking
6 of 7

The Justia Lawyer Directory features attorney reviews and ratings!

Any verified lawyer with a Justia account can write a review for another lawyer, provided that they are personally familiar with the attorney’s work.

The more reviews you receive, the greater your online reputation and your standing in the community. Showcase your badge with your Justia Lawyer Rating on your websites, blogs, and other properties.

It’s easy to request peer reviews:

  1. Direct your colleague to the "Rate this Lawyer" button under your name on your profile page
  2. We'll notify you once you receive a review(s)

Be the first lawyer in your area to get a perfect 10!

Learn more about the Justia Lawyer Rating

Disclaimer: Justia is not a law firm and cannot provide legal advice. Be sure to check your state bar rules to confirm that asking for and posting peer reviews is ethically permissible in your jurisdiction.

Your lawyer profile appears on the websites of JUSTIA and Cornell Law School’s Legal Information Institute where millions of users search for laws, legal resources and lawyers.
